text: this is Jeff bar here in Seattle today
I'd like to tell you about usage-based
pricing for Amazon chime most
communication products and services come
with complicated service agreements and
billing terms you often have to sign
long term contracts and to negotiate a
better price you have to purchase a
service for all your employees even if
many don't use it with Emmas on chime
usage-based pricing you only pay when
your employees host meetings we've done
away with our tier pricing and now
charged $3.00 per meeting host per
calendar day with a maximum charge of
$15 per host per month to learn more
about Amazon chime meetings usage-based
pricing visit aws.amazon.com / chime /
pricing
[Music]
